Ali kale ndi makasitomala a 3, koma akulankhula ndi makasitomala ena a 5 omwe angakhale nawo ndipo ali ndi chidaliro chokwanira kuti awaphatikize mu mawerengedwe ake. Nyumba ya kasitomala aliyense idzafunikira mabotolo a 2 a bleach ndi paketi ya nsalu kuti ayeretse. Mabotolo a mankhwala oyeretsa adzawononga $2 iliyonse ndipo mapaketi a nsalu adzawononga $5 iliyonse. Izi ndizo ndalama zake zokha. Iye amaŵerengera kuti ndalama zonse zimene amapeza mlungu uliwonse zidzakhala $92. Phindu ndi kusiyana pakati pa ndalama zonse ndi ndalama zonse, choncho kodi Lucas adzapanga phindu lochuluka bwanji, mu madola, mlungu uliwonse?
John ali ndi mahekitala 10 a munda wa nthochi. Pali nthochi 100 pa hekitala. John amatha kukolola nthochi zake miyezi 3 iliyonse. Kodi John angakolole nthochi zingati mkati mwa chaka?

Johnny akutenga zoseweretsa pansi mchipinda chake.  Iye adataya bokosi la lego lokhala ndi zidutswa 500 pansi, ndi lina lomwe linali ndi zidutswa 3 kuposa chidutswa cha 500, ndi china chomwe chinali ndi 1/4 chiwerengero cha zidutswa.  Kodi Johnny amatenga mipiringidzo ingati ngati atenga ma legos onse?

Debra akuyang'anira khola la njuchi kuti awone kuchuluka kwa njuchi zomwe zimabwera ndikupita patsiku. Amawona njuchi 30 zikuchoka m'khola m'maola 6 oyambirira, kenako amawona 1/2 kuti njuchi zambiri zimabwerera m'maola 6 otsatira. Amawona njuchi zochulukirapo kawiri kuposa momwe adawonera koyamba kuchoka ku ntchentche ya nkhokwe kuchokera ku khola ndikuchoka m'maola 6 otsatira. Kenako njuchi iliyonse yomwe inachoka kale imeneyo sinabwerere kale imabwerera ku khola m'maola 6 otsatira. Kodi ndi njuchi zingati zomwe Debra adawona zikubwerera ku khola m'maola 6 omaliza a tsikulo?

Brittany ndi amayi ake amapita ku nyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale. Mtengo wolowera ndi $12 kwa akulu ndi $10 kwa ana. Amayi a Brittany amapatsa wosunga ndalama tikiti ya mwana 1 ndi tikiti ya 1 wamkulu. Ngati adalandira $8 yosintha, ndi ndalama zingati, mu madola, zomwe adapatsa wosunga ndalama?

Charlie ali ndi abwenzi ambiri a Facebook katatu kuposa Dorothy. James ali ndi abwenzi anayi pa Facebook kuposa Dorothy. Ngati Charlie ali ndi abwenzi 12 pa Facebook, kodi James ali ndi abwenzi angati a Facebook?

Steve ndi Tim akuganiza zowona yemwe angabwere kunyumba kuchokera kusukulu mwachangu kwambiri. Steve amakhala kutali kwambiri kuposa Tim, choncho amaloledwa kukwera njinga yake. Steve amakhala pamtunda wa makilomita 3 kuchokera kusukulu ndipo amatha kuyendetsa njinga pa 440 mapazi pamphindi. Tim amakhala pamtunda wa makilomita 2 kuchokera kusukulu. Ngati Tim akhoza kukwera skateboard yake pa 264 mapazi pa mphindi, kodi wopambana adzakhala akudikirira nthawi yaitali bwanji kunyumba kwawo wolephera asanamalize mpikisano?

Shawnda akuganiza kuti ana am'dera lake atha kugwiritsa ntchito ntchito yokwera njinga. Amasankha njira yabwino kwambiri yolipiritsira ndi tayala. Tayala lililonse limawononga masenti 25 kuti liwonjezere. Pa tsiku loyamba, anthu 5 okwera njinga anabwera kudzafufumitsa matayala onse aŵiri. Anthu 3 anabwera kudzafufumitsa matayala awo onse a njinga zitatu. Pomaliza, munthu m'modzi adabweradi pa unicycle. Kodi adapanga madola angati tsiku limenelo?

Carl amagula mapaketi khumi a makeke. Paketi iliyonse ya makeke ili ndi makeke asanu ndi limodzi mkati. Cookie iliyonse imawononga $0.10. Kodi Carl amalandira ndalama zingati ngati apereka ndalama zokwana madola 10?

Dave adagula paketi yayikulu ya batala yaku France ndipo adadya khumi ndi anayi seagull wanjala asanabe paketiyo m'manja mwake. Pamene seagull idatera, adadya theka la batala laku France lomwe Dave adadya. Kenako nkhunda zitatu zinamuvutitsa kutali ndi chakudyacho, ndipo nkhunda iliyonse inadya batala katatu. Pambuyo pake, nyalugwe inaba magawo awiri mwa atatu a batala otsalawo. Nyerere zinanyamula fry yomaliza yaku France, ndikusiya zisanu kumbuyo. Kodi ndi batala angati a ku France omwe anali mu paketi pamene Dave adagula?

Lolemba, Lachitatu, ndi Lachisanu, wophunzira waku koleji Kimo ali ndi makalasi atatu a ola limodzi tsiku lililonse.  Lachiwiri ndi Lachinayi, amakhala ndi makalasi awiri a maola 2 tsiku lililonse.  Mu semester imodzi, pali masabata 16 a sukulu.  Mu semester imodzi, kodi Kimo amathera maola angati popita kumaphunziro?

Bill amaphika mipukutu 300, ma croissants 120 a chokoleti, ndi ma baguettes 60 tsiku lililonse. Mpukutu uliwonse ndi mainchesi 4 m'litali, croissant iliyonse ndi mainchesi 6 kutalika, ndipo baguette iliyonse ndi mamita awiri m'litali. Ngati Bill ataika zinthu zonse zophika kumapeto mpaka kumapeto, zidzakhala m'mapazi mpaka liti?

Woyang'anira malo osungiramo nyama amadyetsa anyani onse m'malo osungiramo nyama. Amalamula nthochi zonse kuchokera ku famu yakomweko miyezi 2 iliyonse. Ngati anyani amafunikira nthochi 200, anyani amafunikira nthochi 400, ndipo anyani amafunikira nthochi 100 mwezi uliwonse, ndi nthochi zingati zomwe amafunikira kulamula kuti zikhale miyezi 2?

Blake ndi Kelly akuchita mpikisano kuti awone yemwe angathamange kwambiri mu mphindi 15. Amasankha kuchita izo pabwalo la mpira lomwe lili ndi mamita 100 kutalika. Blake amathamanga mmbuyo ndi mtsogolo nthawi 15. Kelly amathamanga kumbuyo ndi kutsogolo kamodzi, kenako akuganiza kuti sakufuna kuthamanga pafupi ndi Blake, kotero amayamba kuthamanga ku mzere wa 40-yard ndi kumbuyo. Amachita izi nthawi 34. Kodi wopambana amathamanga patali motani kuposa wolephera?

Raphael anapita kukagula zinthu zina za kusukulu. Anagula zolembera 4 zomwe zimawononga $1.5 iliyonse, zolemba 2 zomwe zimawononga $4 iliyonse, ndi mkombero wa pepala la mgwirizano lomwe limawononga $20. Kodi Raphael adawononga ndalama zingati pachilichonse?

Finn amayang'ana ma tadpoles 11 akusambira m'dziwe.  Mwadzidzidzi akuwona 6 mwa iwo akutuluka kubisala pansi pa maluwa ,kenako akuwona 2 mwa iwo akubisala pansi pa thanthwe.  Kodi ndi ma tadpoles angati omwe Finn angawone m'dziwe tsopano?

Thanki yamadzi ili ndi kuya kwa mamita 17 Lolemba. Lachiwiri, thankiyo inali ndi madzi ambiri a 7 mapazi. Lachitatu, kuya kwa madzi ndi magawo awiri mwa atatu a zomwe zinali Lachiwiri. Kodi kuya kwa madzi a thanki Lachitatu ndi kotani?

Anakin ndi Locsin adapita ku gombe lero. Anakin anagwira nsomba 10 za starfish, mahatchi 6 a m'nyanja, ndi nsomba 3 za clownfish. Pomwe Locsin adagwira nsomba 5 zochepa kuposa Anakin, 3 mahatchi am'nyanja kuposa Anakin, ndi 2 clownfish kuposa Anakin. Kodi anatha kugwira nsomba zingati?
Ngati thumba la marble limawononga $20 ndipo mtengo umawonjezeka ndi 20% ya mtengo woyambirira miyezi iwiri iliyonse, kodi thumba la marble lingawononge ndalama zingati pambuyo pa miyezi 36?

M'chipinda, muli zoseweretsa zosiyanasiyana: magalimoto ofiira a 5, zithunzi 3 zochitapo kanthu, ndi chidole. Chidole chimawononga ndalama zokwana 3 action figures ndipo galimoto imodzi yofiira idawononga $4. Kodi zoseweretsa zonse ndi zochuluka bwanji, za chithunzi chochitapo kanthu zimawononga $5?

Jackie akuyesera kusankha ngati angapereke misonkho yake yekha kapena kulemba ntchito wolemba akaunti. Ngati achita misonkho yekha, adzatha kuchita maola ochepa a 3 ogwira ntchito yodziyimira payekha, kutaya $35 / ola limodzi mu ndalama zophonya. Woyang'anira akaunti amalipiritsa $90. Kodi adzakhala ndi ndalama zochuluka motani ngati alemba ntchito wolemba akaunti?

Pa tsiku lake lobadwa la 30, Elvira anasankha kompyuta yatsopano yokhala ndi zipangizo zambiri monga mphatso. Ali ndi bajeti ya € 1500 yoperekedwa ndi banja lake lonse ndipo akuganiza kuti adzatha kusunga ndalama zochepa kuti agule chovala. Amapita ku sitolo yamakompyuta ndikusankha makina omwe amawononga € 1090 ndi chophimba, kiyibodi ndi mbewa. Amatenganso makina osindikizira a € 157, chowotcha cha CD chokwana € 74 ndi chosindikizira cha € 102. Kodi adzakhala atatsala ndi ndalama zingati zogulira zovala zake?

Mnansi wa Sandra amamupatsa dengu la mazira 9 nthawi iliyonse akasamalira mwana wawo wamkazi. Kuti apange flank yaku Spain, amafunikira mazira 3. Ngati Sandra wapatsidwa ntchito yopanga ma flans 15 a Chisipanishi kaamba ka ndalama zake za kusukulu, kodi Sandra ayenera kusamalira kangati mwana?
Seti ndi wamkulu kawiri kuposa Brooke. M'zaka 2, chiwerengero cha zaka zawo chidzakhala 28. Kodi Seti ali ndi zaka zingati?
Jimmy ali ndi $2 kuposa kawiri ndalama zomwe Ethel ali nazo. Ngati Ethal ali ndi $8, Jimmy ali ndi ndalama zingati?
Pancho amayenda makilomita 20 patsiku. Kupatula kumapeto kwa sabata pamene amayenda makilomita 10. Kodi amayenda makilomita angati pa sabata?

Gulu loyenda likulamula yunifolomu yatsopano. Yunifolomu iliyonse imabwera ndi chipewa chomwe chimawononga $25, jekete lomwe limawononga katatu kuposa chipewa, ndi mathalauza omwe amawononga pafupifupi ndalama za chipewa ndi jekete. Kodi yunifolomu iliyonse imawononga ndalama zingati?

Jake akuyenda kudzera mu Museum of Entomology. Amawona akangaude 80 okhala ndi miyendo 8 iliyonse, tizilombo 90 tokhala ndi miyendo 6 iliyonse, ndi tizilombo toyambitsa matenda 3 omwe ali ndi miyendo 10 iliyonse. Kodi Jake amawona miyendo ingati yonse?

Pali mbalame zinayi ku Caboose. Sally Two ndi wamkulu zaka zitatu kuposa Granny Red. Agogo Ofiira ali ndi zaka ziwiri kuposa Sally Four. Ngati Sally Four ali ndi zaka zofanana ndi Sally Thirtytwo, ndipo Sally Thirtytwo ali ndi zaka 8, kodi mbalame zinayi ndi ziti?

Jessica akuyesera kulingalira kuchuluka kwa ndalama zomwe ayenera kulipira pa ngongole zake zonse mwezi uliwonse. Ngongole zake zophunzira zimakhala ndi malipiro osachepera a $300 / mwezi, zochepa za khadi lake la ngongole ndi $200 / mwezi, ndipo zochepa za ngongole yake ndi $500 / mwezi. Ngati Jessica akufuna kulipira 50% kuposa zochepa, kodi amapereka ndalama zingati pachaka?

Billy akupukuta ndi kudula mbatata pokonzekera kupanga saladi ya mbatata ya banja lake lalikulu la kugwirizananso kwa barbecue. Ndi chochitika chachikulu, kotero ali ndi mbatata 60 kuti adutse. Mbatata ndi pafupifupi kukula kofanana, choncho zimatenga pafupifupi nthawi yofanana kupukuta ndi kudula iliyonse. Zimatengera Billy pafupifupi mphindi imodzi ndi theka kuti achotse mbatata, koma pafupifupi masekondi 5 okha kuti adule. Kodi Billy adzatenga nthawi yayitali bwanji kuti amalize kukonzekera mbatata?

Juan ndi mchimwene wake Carlos akugulitsa mandimu. Pa lita iliyonse yomwe amapanga imawononga $3 ya mandimu ndi $2 ya shuga. Amagulitsa galasi lililonse pa $0.50 ndipo amapeza magalasi 20 pa lita imodzi. Ngati iwo anapanga phindu la $25, kodi anawononga ndalama zingati pa mandimu?

M'mpikisano wokhala ndi anthu 240 a ku Asia, 80 anali a ku Japan, ndipo ena onse anali a ku China. Ngati chiwerengero cha anyamata m'gulu la China chinali 60, kodi ndi atsikana angati omwe anali m'gulu la China?

Zaid amawononga 1/4 ya malipiro ake pa lendi, 1/3 pa mafuta a galimoto ndipo amapereka theka la ndalama zotsala ku bungwe lomwe amakonda. Amapatsa mwana wake wamkazi 200$kuti agwiritse ntchito ndalama zake za mlungu uliwonse ndi 700$kwa mkazi wake kuti apange bajeti ya golosale ndi zinthu zina zapakhomo. Ngati Zaid amalandira 6000$pamwezi, adzakhalabe ndi ndalama zingati pambuyo pa ndalama zonsezi ndi zopereka?
Rani ali ndi nkhanu khumi kuposa Monic, yemwe ali ndi nkhanu 4 zochepa kuposa Bo. Ngati Bo ali ndi nkhanu 40, werengani chiwerengero chonse cha nkhanu zomwe atatuwo ali nazo pamodzi.
Lloyd amalandira $10 pa ola limodzi pa maphunziro a Masamu.  Anaphunzitsa maola 5 sabata yoyamba ndi maola 8 sabata yachiwiri. Kodi analandira ndalama zingati pa milungu iwiri yoyamba?

Otsatira awiri akuthamanga kuti akhale woimira kalasi ku sukulu ya Sarai. Ngati wopambana adapeza 3/4 ya mavoti ndipo chiwerengero chonse cha ophunzira omwe adavota m'kalasi chinali 80, werengani chiwerengero cha mavoti omwe wolephera adapeza.

Sandra, wogulitsa maluwa kuzungulira ngodya, sakusangalala kwambiri ndi kutumiza kwa Fred kosakwanira. Sandra adalamula maluwa ofiira kuwirikiza kanayi kuposa ma carnations oyera. Iye analamulanso maluŵa 200 a pinki a calla, amene anali kuwirikiza kasanu chiŵerengero cha carnations yoyera. Sandra waopseza kuti adzasintha ogulitsa ngati maluwa ofiira omwe akusowa saperekedwa pofika 5 koloko madzulo. Kuti asunge bizinesi ya Sandra, ndi maluwa angati ofiira omwe Fred ayenera kupereka pofika 5 koloko madzulo?
Jean ndi wamkulu zaka ziwiri kuposa Mark.  Zaka ziwiri zapitazo Mark anali wamkulu zaka 5 kuposa theka la zaka za Jan.  Ngati Jan ali ndi zaka 30 Jean ali ndi zaka zingati?

Magulu awiri a njanji akupikisana wina ndi mnzake mu kulandirana kwa 4 ndi 400 mita; mpikisano womwe gulu lililonse lomwe likupikisana limakhala ndi mamembala anayi omwe aliyense amathamanga mamita 400, kapena mkombero umodzi, mozungulira njira yokhazikika.  Mmodzi mwa magulu awiriwa ndi ozungulira bwino kwambiri ndipo aliyense wa mamembala awo adzathamanga mwendo wawo wa 400 mita mu masekondi 55 ndendende.  Gulu lina silikuyenda bwino; Wothamanga wawo woyamba adzathamanga mwendo wawo wa 400 mita mu masekondi 60 ndiye wothamanga aliyense wotsatira adzakhala masekondi 3 mofulumira kuposa wothamanga wam'mbuyomu.  Pogwiritsa ntchito chidziwitsochi, kodi gulu lofulumira kwambiri lidzapambana masekondi angati?

Jerry akugubuduza kufa kwa mbali zisanu ndi chimodzi. Kodi ndizotheka bwanji (zofotokozedwa ngati peresenti) kuti agubuduza nambala yayikulu kuposa 3 kuposa kuti amagubuduza manambala awiri motsatizana?
Jenna ndi amayi ake adatola maapulo ku famu yawo ya apulo. Jenna adatola theka la maapulo ambiri kuposa amayi ake. Ngati amayi ake adapeza maapulo 20, kodi onse awiri adatola maapulo angati?

Russell amagwira ntchito m'sitolo ina ya ziweto ndipo akugawira udzu pakati pa makoswe. Makoswe amasungidwa m'makola a 3 m'magulu ofanana ndipo makoswe aliwonse amapatsidwa zidutswa 6 za udzu. Pali makola 10 a hamsters omwe amasungidwa okha ndipo hamster iliyonse imapatsidwa zidutswa 5 za udzu. Palinso cholembera cha akalulu kumene zidutswa 20 za udzu zimagawidwa pakati pa akalulu. Palibe udzu womwe umagwiritsidwa ntchito kwina kulikonse m'sitolo. Ngati zidutswa 160 za udzu zagawidwa pakati pa makoswe ang'onoang'ono, kodi ndi makoswe angati m'khola lililonse?

Mandy ali ndi ngongole kwa Benedict $100. Iwo anagwirizana kukhala ndi chiwongoladzanja cha mwezi uliwonse cha 2%. Ngati Mandy adatha kulipira pambuyo pa miyezi 3, kodi ayenera kupereka ndalama zingati kwa Benedict?

Wamalonda amagula matumba ena a tirigu kwa mlimi pamlingo wa $20 pa thumba lililonse. Ngati ndalama zokwana madola 2 kunyamula thumba lililonse kuchokera ku famu kupita ku nyumba yosungiramo katundu, ndipo wamalondayo anapeza phindu lonse la madola 400 atagulitsa matumba onse pamlingo wa $30 iliyonse, kodi anagulitsa matumba angati?

Mabwenzi atatu adawononga $20.25 pa matikiti a 3 ku chionetserochi. Anagwiritsanso ntchito ndalama zochepa zokwana madola 4.50 pa chakudya kusiyana ndi matikiti. Anapitanso pa maulendo osiyanasiyana a 2 omwe amawononga $33 paulendo uliwonse. Ngati iwo anagwirizana kugaŵa ndalama zonse mofanana, kodi aliyense wa iwo analipira ndalama zingati?
John amasonkhanitsa mapichesi kwa maola 3.  Amatha kusonkhanitsa mapichesi 2 pamphindi.  Kodi amasonkhanitsa mapichesi angati?
Bakha amafunika kudya makilogalamu 3.5 a tizilombo mlungu uliwonse kuti akhale ndi moyo. Ngati pali gulu la abakha khumi, kodi amafunikira makilogalamu angati a tizilombo patsiku?
Tom amabzala mitengo 10 pachaka.  Chaka chilichonse amadulanso mitengo 2 pachaka.  Amayamba ndi mitengo 50.  Pambuyo pa zaka 10 30% ya mitengo imafa.  Kodi watsala ndi mitengo ingati?

Sue amakhala m'dera losangalatsa.  Kumapeto kwa sabata lina, oyandikana nawo adaganiza zosewerera prank pa Sue.  Lachisanu m'mawa, oyandikana nawo anaika ma flamingo 18 a pulasitiki a pinki pabwalo lakutsogolo kwa Sue.  Loweruka m'mawa, oyandikana nawo nyumba anatenga gawo limodzi mwa magawo atatu a flamingo, n'kuwapaka utoto woyera, ndipo anabwezeretsa ma flamingo oyera atsopanowa pabwalo lakutsogolo kwa Sue.  Kenako, Lamlungu m'mawa, adawonjezera ma flamingo ena 18 a pulasitiki a pinki pazosonkhanitsira. Masana Lamlungu, ndi ma flamingo angati a pulasitiki a pinki omwe anali kunja kuposa flamingo oyera a pulasitiki?
Violetta akufuna kugula makrayoni atsopano. Amawafunikira m'mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya 5 ndipo adakonzekera $20 pakugula uku. Crayoni imodzi imawononga $2. Kodi adzasintha motani?
Cholembera chimawononga ndalama zofanana ndi pensulo ndi chofufutira kuphatikiza. Pensulo imawononga $1.20 ndipo chofufutira chimawononga $0.30. Kodi zolembera 8 zidzawononga ndalama zingati?
Makilogalamu 200 a kaloti ayenera kugawidwa kumalo odyera 40 mumzinda winawake. Malo odyera aliwonse ayenera kulandira mapaundi 2 a kaloti. Ndi mapaundi angati a kaloti omwe sadzagwiritsidwa ntchito?
Mumzinda wa Soda, muli ndendende 23786 anthu. Amaphatikizapo amuna 8417 ndi akazi 9092. Anthu ena onse amapangidwa ndi ana. Kodi pali ana angati ku Soda?

Elaine poyamba anali ndi makhadi 20 a Pokemon. Patatha mwezi umodzi, adasonkhanitsa katatu. M'mwezi wachiwiri, anasonkhanitsa makadi ochepa 20 poyerekeza ndi amene anasonkhanitsa m'mwezi woyamba. M'mwezi wachitatu, adasonkhanitsa kawiri kuchuluka kwa makadi a pokemon omwe adasonkhanitsa m'miyezi yoyamba ndi yachiwiri. Kodi ali ndi makadi angati a pokemon tsopano okwana?

Mark ndi mkonzi wa makope. Amasintha chiwerengero chofanana cha ziganizo sabata iliyonse kwa ofalitsa awiri osiyana, omwe aliyense amamulipira mlingo wosiyana pa chiganizo chilichonse. Wofalitsa B amalipira Mark kawiri zomwe Wofalitsa A amapereka. Mark amasintha ziganizo zokwana 1000 mlungu uliwonse, ndipo Wofalitsa A amamulipira masenti 5 pa chiganizo chilichonse. Kodi Mark amapanga ndalama zingati pa sabata, mu masenti?

Baldur amatenga madzi kuchokera pachitsime. Amalandira madzi 5 m'mawa uliwonse ndi madzi 6 masana aliwonse. Ngati mtsuko uliwonse uli ndi malita 5 a madzi, kodi amapeza malita angati a madzi tsiku lililonse?

John amapambana mphotho kuntchito.  Mphothoyi ili ndi mphotho ya ndalama ya 1 nthawi ya $5000 ndi kukweza kwa 5% malipiro.  Ngati amapanga 2000 pa sabata, sabata iliyonse pachaka ndipo adalandira mphoto tsiku loyamba la chaka ndi ndalama zingati zomwe adapanga chaka chimenecho?

Josie amalima mphesa pa famu yake ya mahekitala 10.  Hekitala iliyonse imatulutsa matani 5 a mphesa pachaka, ndipo tani iliyonse ya mphesa imapanga migolo 2 ya vinyo.  Kodi famu yake imatulutsa vinyo wochuluka motani pachaka?

Chakudya chomwe Carl amakonda kwambiri ndi tchizi. Anadya sangweji tsiku lililonse sabata ino kuti adye chakudya chamasana ndipo adagwiritsa ntchito zidutswa 2 za tchizi pa sangweji iliyonse. Anadya tchizi ndi mazira omelets kadzutsa masiku 3 pa sabata pogwiritsa ntchito chidutswa chimodzi pa omelet kuposa momwe amachitira pa sangweji. Anaphika mbale yayikulu ya macaroni ndi tchizi kuti amupatse chakudya chamadzulo kangapo kwa sabata ndipo adagwiritsa ntchito zidutswa 8 za tchizi mmenemo. Kodi adagwiritsa ntchito zidutswa zingati za tchizi?

Janet anali ndi zolembera 22 zobiriwira ndi zolembera 10 zachikasu. Kenako adagula matumba 6 a zolembera zabuluu ndi matumba 2 a zolembera zofiira. Panali zolembera 9 m'thumba lililonse la buluu ndi zolembera 6 m'thumba lililonse lofiira. Kodi Janet ali ndi zolembera zingati tsopano?

Brinley ali m'kalasi ya masamu ya a Bert. Bambo Bert amapereka mayeso asanu ndi limodzi semester iliyonse. Amalola ophunzirawo kuchotsa chiwerengero chotsika kwambiri kuchokera pa avareji semester iliyonse. Ngati Brinley ali ndi zigoli za 89, 71, 92, 100 ndi 86 pa mayeso asanu oyambirira, kodi amafunikira chiwerengero chotani pa mayeso achisanu ndi chimodzi kuti apeze avareji ya 93?

Micheal amakonda kukwera njinga. Ankakwera nthawi zosachepera 5 pa sabata ndipo amapanga makilomita 25 nthawi iliyonse.
